item.description:
Beehive deserves every bit of the acclaim it's receiving as Boston's top jazz spot.

The key to getting past the 100 yards of trendy bar-goers is to have reservations at a table and order food. They seat people with a table right away where you filter in to the bar based on capacity.

So let's shoot for a reasonable time to eat (8 or 8:30pm) where we won't be catching the matinee or arriving while it's still daylight :)

The bar is fantastic after dinner, and don't be surprised by an impromptu nightcap at the Cantab to finish the night on the dance floor.
item.name: Beehive - Boston's hottest new jazz club
